Did you know that you do not even need shampoo at all? Look up no-poo method for details. Here is the overview:
1) Use a specific cleanse to rid your hair and scalp of gunk built up from commercial shampoos.
2) Use warm water only when in shower. Usual technique; just no shampoo. (slightly warmer than normal water works best; you want to loosen up the scalp oil).
3) Groom daily with scritching motion and boar's hair brush (to distribute scalp oil). (Scritching is scalp massage; similar to shampooing motion, but without water).

The boar's hair brush distributes your scalp's natural oils over your hair, like a natural conditioner.

It takes a month or two for your scalp and hair to adjust. After that, you will never want shampoo again.

which is as much as doing 80km (50 miles) in a gas car...
(250g/km when counting 150g/km of direct emmissions + production and transport of fuel)

reducing wastes IS usefull, but mostly to reduce the amount that do not get processes, even if it's just burned, it's still better than ending up in the ocean

but regarding climat change, the most impactfull changes are :
-not using a car, renting one when needed but staying under 1000 mile/year (-40% of our emmissions) if not possible : switching to a full electric car (-20% of our emmissions)
-not buying red meat (-25% of our emmissions) try vegetal meat, you might be surprised
